title: Episode 239: The Ghosts of Body Narratives with Nora McInerny
itunes:title: Episode 239: The Ghosts of Body Narratives with Nora McInerny
description:
Kate and Doree discuss a not-so-ordinary day in the suburbs before inviting beloved friend of the pod Nora McInerny to talk about her new book Bad Vibes Only, the kind of vanity that is shallow versus the kind that is acceptable, and how the ghost of body narratives still haunt her.  


CW: This episode contains discussion of eating disorders, weight and body image.


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show or visit shopmyshelf.us/forever35.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! at forever35podcast.com/newsletter.
